stories.Title: Japan is on the lookout for solar power
stories.Description: Continuing to pioneer solar energy beaming from space, Japan and JAXA reportedly plan to deploy satellites to transmit collected solar energy to ground stations as early as 2025.
stories.Tweet: Japan is on the lookout for solar power 📦 Continuing to pioneer solar energy beaming from space, Japan and JAXA reportedly plan to deploy satellites to transmit collected solar energy to ground stations as early as 2025. #japan https://www.engadget.com/japan-will-try-to-beam-solar-power-from-space-by-2025-214338244.html

stories.Title: Next stop, Tiangong space station
stories.Description: China's space ambitions continue as the Shenzhou 16 spacecraft prepares to launch a crew of three astronauts to the Tiangong space station tonight.
stories.Tweet: Next stop, Tiangong space station 📦 China's space ambitions continue as the Shenzhou 16 spacecraft prepares to launch a crew of three astronauts to the Tiangong space station tonight. #china https://www.space.com/china-shenzhou-16-astronauts-launch-tiangong-space-station

stories.Title: The Ax-2 crew is ready to go home
stories.Description: Stay tuned for tomorrow's hatch closing and undocking livestream on NASA's YouTube channel as Axiom 2's all-private crew prepares to return to Earth, after spending 10 days in space.
stories.Tweet: The Ax-2 crew is ready to go home 📦 Stay tuned for tomorrow's hatch closing and undocking livestream on NASA's YouTube channel as Axiom 2's all-private crew prepares to return to Earth, after spending 10 days in space. #space https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/axiom-2-departure-livestream/

stories.Title: China keeps gearing up for the lunar race
stories.Description: The China Manned Space Agency has announced ambitious plans to send Chinese astronauts to the moon by 2030, with the support of new space technologies developed specifically for this mission.
stories.Tweet: China keeps gearing up for the lunar race 📦 The China Manned Space Agency has announced ambitious plans to send Chinese astronauts to the moon by 2030, with the support of new space technologies developed specifically for this mission. #china https://spacenews.com/china-sets-sights-on-crewed-lunar-landing-before-2030/

stories.Title: Nvidia's reign in AI continues to grow
stories.Description: During its keynote at COMPUTEX Taipei, Jensen Huang (Nvidia's CEO), unveiled a lineup of groundbreaking systems and software with generative AI as the main attraction.
stories.Tweet: Nvidia's reign in AI continues to grow 📦 During its keynote at COMPUTEX Taipei, Jensen Huang (Nvidia's CEO), unveiled a lineup of groundbreaking systems and software with generative AI as the main attraction. #nvidia https://venturebeat.com/ai/nvidia-ceo-reveals-groundbreaking-generative-ai-innovations-for-industries-at-computex-taipei/

stories.Title: Read all about it: Adobe Firefly
stories.Description: Optimize your workflow with the innovative AI software from Adobe, built to empower professionals and creatives, it enhances the artistic process without overshadowing it.
stories.Tweet: Read all about it: Adobe Firefly 📦 Optimize your workflow with the innovative AI software from Adobe, built to empower professionals and creatives, it enhances the artistic process without overshadowing it. #adobe https://www.creativebloq.com/features/everything-you-need-to-know-about-adobe-firefly

stories.Title: Is generative AI eco-friendly?
stories.Description: As AI-powered technology advances, thousands of chatbots are being developed by a variety of companies, which could cause serious environmental problems in the long run.
stories.Tweet: Is generative AI eco-friendly? 📦 As AI-powered technology advances, thousands of chatbots are being developed by a variety of companies, which could cause serious environmental problems in the long run. #ai https://gizmodo.com/chatgpt-app-ai-is-generative-ai-bad-for-the-environment-1850481190

stories.Title: ChatGPT is not ready for law school
stories.Description: A lawyer's 30-year career hangs in the threads as he unknowingly relied on ChatGPT for a lawsuit, only to discover that the chatbot had included fictitious cases in the legal text.
stories.Tweet: ChatGPT is not ready for law school 📦 A lawyer's 30-year career hangs in the threads as he unknowingly relied on ChatGPT for a lawsuit, only to discover that the chatbot had included fictitious cases in the legal text. #chatgpt https://www.techtimes.com/articles/292010/20230528/lawyer-uses-chatgpt-legal-filing-citing-non-existent-cases.htm

stories.Title: What to expect at this year's WWDC
stories.Description: Apple's highly anticipated WWDC is just one week away, and rumors about new hardware, such as the AR headset, 15-inch MacBook Air, and Apple Silicon-powered Mac Pro, continue to fuel fans' excitement.
stories.Tweet: What to expect at this year's WWDC 📦 Apple's highly anticipated WWDC is just one week away, and rumors about new hardware, such as the AR headset, 15-inch MacBook Air, and Apple Silicon-powered Mac Pro, continue to fuel fans' excitement. #apple https://www.cnet.com/tech/mobile/apple-wwdc-2023-everything-we-expect-at-the-june-5-event/

stories.Title: Meta plans to elevate the VR Experience
stories.Description: Reports have unveiled interesting details about the Meta Quest 3, codenamed Eureka. The groundbreaking headset is lighter, thinner, and designed for ultimate comfort.
stories.Tweet: Meta plans to elevate the VR Experience  📦 Reports have unveiled interesting details about the Meta Quest 3, codenamed Eureka. The groundbreaking headset is lighter, thinner, and designed for ultimate comfort. #meta https://www.theverge.com/2023/5/28/23740500/meta-quest-3-vr-ar-headset-preview-leak-hands-on-rumor

stories.Title: From the lab to your EV
stories.Description: The National University of Singapore is collaborating with CBMM to develop fast-charging, niobium-based batteries that are expected to last 30 years.
